You will learn why businesses prefer AWS over other service providers and what options AWS offers for blockchain deployment. courseDescription:
Have you ever wondered what blockchain technology is and why there’s a growing trend for its adoption? What benefits does it offer and how can it be deployed? We will answer these questions in this free course. You will learn all you need about blockchain technology and its deployment on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform. Professionals from Stone River eLearning have designed this course. They specialize in video-based technology training and IT courses.

We will begin by introducing you to the fundamentals of ‘blockchain as a service’ (BaaS). You will discover what BaaS is and why you use it. We will also demonstrate the process of setting up a free tier account on the AWS platform and outline its fundamentals. Learn the various deployment options AWS offers, including virtual machines and containers. We will also discuss AWS-managed services and blockchain templates. 

Deployment of a blockchain on AWS is a somewhat complex process. We will simplify this approach by providing easy-to-understand demos that will effortlessly demonstrate each step. The final section will focus on deploying various blockchain services on AWS, including Ethereum, Hyperledger and Corda. At the end of this course, you will attain a solid understanding of these concepts to perform blockchain deployment effectively and independently. Enroll now!
